ingredients.ingredient: 6 chicken leg quarters, split into drumsticks and thighs
6 large Yukon Gold potatoes, cut into chunks
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Leave garlic cloves unpeeled so they become sweet and creamy when roasted, easy to squeeze out and eat
Arrange chicken skin-side up and potatoes around it so they roast evenly
Toss potatoes halfway through cooking to ensure they brown on all sides
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you time this dish so the chicken and potatoes finish cooking simultaneously?
